front.title: IEEE Standards for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks: Supplement to Token-Passing Bus Access Method and Physical Layer Specifications. Alternative Use of BNC Connectors and Manchester-Encoded Signaling Methods for Single-Channel Bus Physical Layer Entities

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This supplement to ISO/IEC 8802-4:1990 [ANSI/IEEE Std 802.4-1990] provides the functional, electrical, and mechanical characteristics of single-channel differential and Manchester-data-encoded bus Physical Layer Entities (PLEs).
